name: MOTHERBOARD OVERLOAD (Demo)
description: THE COUNTDOWN DEMO. You, being Girlfriend find your computer with a bootleg copy of Sonic the Hedgehog, figuring it was your dad who just was cheap and was trying to save money. You decide to play it. Unfortunately thats where everything will go wrong for you. MOTHER has already taken the influence of your computer and now has full access to everything and anything within the motherboard's system, and to the tip of the iceberg to just a single file with nothing in it. Save her? or save your computer. The choice is NOT yours. for She is the god of the Technological Realm.
